thread.title: Anna Harris
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Anna Harris

author: Anna Harris
title: Anna Harris
text: Ordered a Barbour jacket and received it the next day. Unfortunalty there was a fault with the zip and one phone call later another was sent. My boyfriend ordered some hunters for me for Christmas and again arrived promptly. Would definitely order from again.
